text: José María Peralta (December 1807 – December 6, 1883) was born in San Salvador. He was President of El Salvador from 15 February to 12 March 1859. He died in San Salvador. == See also == * History of El Salvador == References and notes == Category:Presidents of El Salvador Category:1807 births Category:1883 deaths Category:People from San Salvador
title: José María Peralta
